attributes.action: Make less homework in schools around the UK!
attributes.additional_details: My son comes home with 15 pieces of homework a week and he has no time to himself or with his family and I’m sure it’s exactly the same with other family’s and schools are handing out detentions and after school detentions if they aren’t completed
attributes.background: Take this to parliament to make it so students in secondary don’t have to do so much homework until there gcse’s

rejection.details: Decisions about homework are a matter for individual schools. You could start a new petition about something that Government or Parliament is directly responsible for, explaining clearly what you would like Government or Parliament to do.
